text: ca# kaqpAlA#ni cAgnihOtraqhava#NI caq SUrpa#M ca kRuShNAjiqnaM caq SamyA# cOqlUKa#laM caq musa#laM ca dRuqShaccOpa#lA caiqtAniq vai daSa# yaj~jAyuqdhAniq ya EqvaM ~MvEda# muKaqtO$&sya yaqj~jaH ka#lpatEq yO vai dEqvEBya#H pratiqprOcya# yaqj~jEnaq yaja#tE juqShantE$&sya dEqvA haqvya(gm) haqvi rni#ruqpyamA#NamaqBi ma#ntrayEtAq&gni(gm) hOtA#ramiqha ta(gm) hu#vaq iti#- [  ] 27
